name: Speedy French Onion Soup
author: Campbell's Kitchen
summary: Warm up with a bowl of this savory soup that's loaded with incredible flavor. Caramelized onions simmer with sweet onion soup and beef consommé. It's topped with cheesy garlic Texas toast and is so good you may want to double the recipe because it will be gone in a flash!
ingredients: 4 large onions, cut in half and thinly sliced
1 (14.5 ounce) carton Campbell's® Sweet Onion Soup
1 (10.5 ounce) can  Campbell's® Condensed Beef Consomme or Campbell's® Condensed Beef Broth
4 slices Pepperidge Farm® Garlic Texas Toast, prepared according to package directions
directions: Heat the butter in a 4-quart saucepan over medium heat
Add the onions and cook for 15 minutes or until well browned and caramelized, stirring occasionally
Stir the soup, consomme and 1 soup can water in the saucepan and heat to a boil
